content: @Grahame Grieve During the HL7 WGM in Montreal there were some side discussions around making testing statistical data available. Weâ€™re just starting to work on the public api interface and eventual gui display in Touchstone for this and I want to solicit from you and anyone else examples of the types of data values you would like to see?

There are two categories to consider: Public and Private. Public data is de-identified from the individual users and organizations and represents information showing industry trends and adoption. Private data is only accessible to an individual user or organization and represents their own internal testing results.
